greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,h) = number of functions f:{1,2,...,n}->{1,2,...,n-2} such that |Image(f)|=h, h=1,2,...,n-2; n=3,4,....
formula: T(n, h) = C(n-2, h)*U(n, h), where U(n, h) is the array in A019538.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Dec 17 2004
